name: SchoolBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask school buddy what are the events in school tomorrow”
”Alexa, ask school buddy whats happening in my school”
”Alexa, ask school buddy whats happening in school next week”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: school buddy
des: Search and Read Events on the Public School Calendar
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
